--create station dimension table

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'DimStation')
DROP TABLE DimStation

CREATE TABLE dbo.DimStation
(
    StationName NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    StationComplex NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    Borough NVARCHAR(15) NULL,
    IsHistorical BIT NULL,
    ServiceAvailable BIT NULL,
    WifiAvailable BIT NULL
)
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


--create rides fact table
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'FactRides')
DROP TABLE FactRides

CREATE TABLE dbo.FactRides (
    RideDate DATE NULL,
    StationComplex NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    TransitMode NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    PaymentMethod NVARCHAR(50) NULL
--    FareClassCategory NVARCHAR(50) NULL
--    Transfers FLOAT(4) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(StationComplex),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

--create stations staging table

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'StageStation')
DROP TABLE StageStation

CREATE TABLE dbo.StageStation (
    StationName NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    StationComplex NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    Borough NVARCHAR(15) NULL,
    IsHistorical BIT NULL,
    ServiceAvailable BIT NULL,
    WifiAvailable BIT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

--create rides staging table

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'StageRides')
DROP TABLE StageRides

CREATE TABLE dbo.StageRides (
    RideDate DATE NULL,
    StationComplex NVARCHAR(100) NULL,
    TransitMode NVARCHAR(100) NULL,
    PaymentMethod NVARCHAR(100) NULL,
    FareClassCategory NVARCHAR(100) NULL,
    Transfers INT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);
